cards.title: Optimization Models
content: We solve real-world problems using cutting-edge optimization techniques.
Aircraft Assignment – Copa Airlines: We assign planes minimizing changes, delays, and maintenance impact.
Batch Sizing – Grupo Diana: Reduces production costs and maximizes efficiency.
Distribution Optimization – Huevos Kikes: Route design reduces logistics costs by over 20%.

cards.title: Forecasting and Demand Planning
content: Custom time series models that predict short, medium, and long-term trends.
Sales Forecasting – Grupo Corona: Includes macroeconomic variables like GDP and exchange rate.
Inventory Planning – Retail Chains: Predicts consumption and automates replenishment.

cards.title: Personalization and Recommendations
content: AI that boosts loyalty, increases average ticket, and enhances customer insight.
Smart Promotions – Grupo Diana: Personalized offers based on customer behavior.
Recommendation Systems: Suggests unpurchased products using graphs and AI.
Loyalty Analysis – OfficeMax: Behavioral clustering to improve retention.

cards.title: AI as a Service (SaaS)
content: All our models are deployed serverless in AWS, with continuous improvement and support. You focus on growth—we handle the math.
